Posts.Content: Concerned4444 wrote: I got a call back for a second mammogram. They did the mammogram and then an ultrasound. Next Monday I will go in for an ultrasound guided biopsy. Totally freaking out. No history of bc in my family. No pain or noticeable lumps. I do have cysts and dense breast tissue. I'm 46 y/o. I'm the total opposite of a hypochondriac, but this has me rattled. This is silly, but my lips have been incredibly chapped, raw and inflamed. I haven't seen any correlations with that and bc on the internet. Has anyone heard of that as an early symptom? I know, ridiculous question, but my mind is going nuts right now. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy Monday, October 30th Concerned4444 Concerned4444

Posts.Content: Concerned4444 wrote: Anyone else panicking about an upcoming biopsy with a birad score of 4 with a vodka and camel habit? I know how ridiculous this sounds but I'm thinking quitting smoking and drinking will be necessary and difficult to quit if I fall in the 20th percentile after my test and results. Please don't judge or advice, I'm looking for responses from people who can relate Log in to post a reply
